text: The original module I am work,ing with overcomes this by assigning a data-id="{{loop.index}}" in a nested loop that outputs an index of 1-0, 2-0, 3-0, etc. I have added the parent loop and I can only get the {{loop.index}} to output a single digit, thus creating the JS conflict when all the children have the same data-id="1" etc.
I hope this makes sense. Lol
That is nested for loops, btw...
